summary: Frontend bug verification testing completed successfully. All reported bugs are FIXED. Login works, Dashboard renders with balance/recharge button, Support button navigates to /support page (NOT WhatsApp), PIX form has both required fields (amount_brl + payer_cpf).
context_for_next_testing_agent: All reported bugs have been verified as fixed. Support button navigates to internal /support page. PIX form sends correct payload with amount_brl and payer_cpf.
